name: 1187: Episode One
storyline: It's Life in Amstelveen, the Netherlands, after the Xen invasion. It's been a week since Joure last left the apartment. A familiar home is now a very unfamiliar and unwelcome place, no longer a home sweet home. Rations are running low, weird creatures are running havoc, and with no way of defending himself he heads out into the appartment complex, surviving, trying to see it all through to a safe end, if anything as such exists ...
summary: Creatures came out of what seemed to be thin air. Animated and alive. They came without a warning and swept the world...
